APBS programmer's guide
=======================

The APBS programmer's guide is generated by `Doxygen <http://www.stack.nl/~dimitri/doxygen/>`_ and available for download as a :download:`ZIP file </media/apbs-programmers-guide.zip>`.

.. todo::

   Move Programmer's Guide to `Sphinx <http://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/stable/index.html>`_.
